long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SalesReach Chrome Extension integrates seamlessly with your SalesReach account to enable you to quickly record videos (including audio-only, webcam, and screen-share functionality) and create personalized Buyer Portals to share with your prospects. 

Additionally, the extension provides up-to-date information on activity on your Buyer Portals as well the ability to chat with your prospects directly from the extension!

Features include:
- Record, edit, and share Videos directly from Chrome
- Create personalized Buyer Portals to share with your prospects
- Track user engagement such as visits, clicks, and video plays that occur on the Buyer Portals you create
- Copy links to easily share your Buyer Portals through SMS, email, and social media
- Receive and respond to chat messages that occur on your Buyer Portal directly from the extension
- Integrates with HubSpot and Salesforce to allow you to associate Buyer Portals with your CRM records

This extension requires an account on SalesReach.io to use. Visit us at https://www.salesreach.io to learn more!
